Beschrijving van het bedrijf, , Eurofins Scientific is een internationaal beursgenoteerd bedrijf dat haar klanten voorziet van hoogwaardig laboratoriumonderzoek en advies Eurofins is wereldwijd marktleider op het gebied van bioanalytische testen voor voeding, water, milieu en farmaceutische producten Daarnaast is Eurofins n van de grootste aanbieders ter wereld in een groeiend aantal andere markten zoals bijvoorbeeld de agrarische sector of op het gebied van genomics Eurofins maakt daarbij gebruik van een unieke hoeveelheid analysemethoden en een ongekend hoog kennisniveau en expertise Eurofins bestaat wereldwijd uit ruim 47000 medewerkers, verdeeld over meer dan 800 hyper moderne laboratoria en is actief in 47 landen met een omzet van 45B in 2019 Eurofins kent sterke groeiambities CAGR 25 en verwacht in 2020 een omzet van 50B te kunnen realiseren Naast zeer sterke autonome groei heeft Eurofins in 2019 in verschillende landen een totaal van ruim 20 acquisities gedaan, , Onze mensen bij Eurofins leveren een belangrijke bijdrage aan wereldwijde themas op het gebied van onder meer milieu, voedselveiligheid en algehele gezondheid Medewerkers zijn trots op het werk dat zij doen en ervaren veel vrijheid bij de uitvoering van de functie Verantwoordelijkheden liggen zo laag mogelijk in de organisatie, zodat de mensen met de juiste informatie de juiste besluiten kunnen nemen Eurofins investeert structureel in de persoonlijke ontwikkeling van talent, zowel op het gebied van leiderschap, doorgroeipotentie als inhoudelijke kennis, , Logistiek is voor Eurofins van doorslaggevend belang Enerzijds om klanten te ontzorgen in het transport van product samples, anderzijds omdat Eurofins laboratoria in Nederland en omringende landen veelal sterk specifieke test competenties kennen Dit houdt in dat de te testen product samples efficint over verschillende locaties dienen te worden verspreid Hiervoor stelt Eurofins haar eigen logistieke services ter beschikking in de vorm van distributienetwerken, warehouses en een gecentraliseerde customer service 7 Dagen per week werkt een groot team van logistiek medewerkers om de Eurofins laboratoria en klanten optimaal te kunnen bedienen, , Voor meer informatie verwijzen we graag naar , , Functieomschrijving, , , , De Operations Manager Logistics is verantwoordelijk voor de dagelijkse aansturing en het verder professionaliseren van de logistieke services van Eurofins in de Benelux en de internationale lijndienst Met in totaal ca 120 medewerkers vast en flex wordt dit onderdeel aangestuurd vanuit de locatie Barneveld, , , , De Operations Manager Logistics rapporteert aan de Business Unit Manager Logistics, Standplaats Barneveld, , Functieeisen, , Je hebt de drive en ambitie om verder door te groeien binnen Eurofins Je hebt aantoonbare leiding gevende ervaring in de dienstverlening en sterke affiniteit met logistiek en IT Jij bent als Manager van nature meer in charge dan in control Je bent sterk analytisch onderlegd en hebt natuurlijke affiniteit met de dagelijkse bedrijfsvoering en het sturen op efficiency door middel van cijfers Je beschikt over een afgeronde WO opleiding, gaat pragmatisch om met complexiteit en hebt een flinke dosis lef Je neemt geen genoegen met status quo, bent zelfsturend en resultaatgericht, , , Trackrecord in verbeteren, toepassing van LEAN ed, , , , , , , , Extra informatie, , , , Je wordt onderdeel van het snelgroeiende en dynamische bedrijf Eurofins, waarmee je een stevige basis aan management ervaring toevoegt aan je CV Met een groeiend aantal vestigingen biedt Eurofins kansen voor talent voor nationale en internationale vervolgstappen Eurofins biedt een marktconform salaris en goede secundaire voorwaarden En uiteraard een team met enthousiaste en gedreven collegas, , , , Wil je meer informatie over deze uitdagende functie neem dan contact op met Michiel Prins, Talent Acquisition Manager, via 31 6 44835778 of michielprinseurofinscom, , Heb je Location: Berkel en Rodenrijs, South Holland, Netherlands
Job Description: Koppert Biological Systems produces sustainable cultivation solutions for food crops and ornamental plants Together with growers and in partnership with nature, we work to make agriculture and horticulture healthier, safer, more productive and resilient If you are intrigued by an organization that is focused in supporting the growth of chemical free sustainable crops using the power of nature, and if you are a professional that thinks strategically and acts tactically to make things happen, we want you to join our team We are looking for a Business Unit Manager NorthWest Europe 40 hours a week, Berkel en Rodenrijs, Rotterdam area What does the department look like You will be a member of the Business Unit management team for Europe and will collaborate and coordinate with the BU EU, maintaining the relationship with the BU Manager Europe and other Business Unit Managers regarding strategic decisions about the direction of the business The Koppert sales countries of the NorthWest Europe region are the Netherlands, United Kingdom, Belgium, Germany, Austria and Switzerland What are you going to do  The Business Unit Manager is responsible for the subsidiaries the wellbeing of our customers and employees, and a living example of our mission and core values as part of the global Koppert family The Business Unit Manager monitors and supports the subsidiarys P  L, cash, risk management, sales, operations, finance, production, HR, country strategy and vision, asset management and organizational development Furthermore the Business Unit Manager

Company Description, , At Beyond Meat, we started with simple questions Why do you need an animal to create meat Why cant you build meat directly from plants Thus, we make plantbased meats that allow families to eat more, not less, of the traditional dishes they love while feeling great about the health, sustainability, and animal welfare benefits of plant protein Our goal is to bring exciting change to the plateand Beyond, , , , This a fulltime position, reporting to the Sr VP of Global Operations and Technical Services, that will oversee European Expansion plans at Beyond Meat Our plans include equipment installation and external manufacturing line commissioning in an effort to convert our proprietary ingredients into finished commercial products for the Market Our Senior External Manufacturing Manager will own and deliver the strategic plan to expand, complete the sourcing work, deliver the design and startups required and on occasion provide important customer interface representing the Operations team The role will require significant travel in Europe and across the US, , RESPONSIBLITIES, , , QUALFICIATIONS, , , Physical Demands and Work Environment, , , Beyond Meat is an equal employment opportunity employer Candidates are considered for employment without regard to race, creed, color, national origin, age, sex, religion, ancestry, veteran status, marital status, gender identify, sexual orientation, national origin, liability for military service, or any other characteristic protected by applicable federal, state, or local law If you are interested in learning the status of your application, please note you will be contacted directly by the appropriate human resources contact person if you are selected for further consideration Beyond Meat reserves the right to defer or close a vacancy at any time, , Enschede , , Operations , , Fulltime

Job Description, , Position at Ingram Micro Commerce  Lifecycle Services, Manage jij straks n van de highend logistieke operaties van bolcom , , Als Site Operations Manager wordt jouw uitdaging het overnemen van een succesvol en efficint draaiende site, , , Jazeker De warehousing capaciteit wordt namelijk uitgebreid, een verdubbeling Zodra alle warehouses volwaardig actief zijn werken er duizenden operators in een enorme logistieke operatie welke nu volledig is ingericht Je uitdaging in de functie als Site Operations Manager zit de eerste 6 maanden in het leren kennen en begrijpen van de complexiteit van de site als aanvulling op je kennis en ervaring die jij mee neemt naar Ingram Micro CLS en onze klant Bolcom, , , Welnee Je volgende uitdaging staat alweer klaar de integratie van het 1e bolcom fulfilment center met het 2e bolcom fulfilment center 40 meter hoog en een capaciteit van 40000 items per uur Uiteraard zorg je vanaf je start ervoor dat de efficintie van de werkprocessen optimaal is en blijft Jouw bijdrage hieraan lever je door elke dag dingen beter te doen dan de dag ervoor Je houdt in een dynamische omgeving je helicopterview en neemt de juiste beslissingen Daar heb je wel lef en overtuigingskracht voor nodig Jij bent namelijk verantwoordelijk voor de dagelijkse operatie met alle logistieke processen die daarbij horen, , Op het bolcom fulfilment center BFC wordt een groot deel van de bestellingen verwerkt voor de klanten van bolcom De belofte van snelle levering wordt door het fulfilment center elke dag nagekomen en dat brengt een moderne en efficinte logistieke operatie met zich mee Om te anticiperen op deze dynamiek beschikt het fulfilment center over een imposante hoge mechanisatiegraad, , , In de functie Site Operations Manager ben je binnen het Warehouse Operations MT verantwoordelijk voor de operatie van n van de bolcom Fulfilment Centerunits Je geeft leiding op een coachende manier maar stelt daarbij ook duidelijke kaders En dat doe je niet vanachter je bureau, maar je gaat de werkvloer op om te zien wat er cht gebeurt Je stuurt in deze rol direct 2 Operations Managers aan en indirect ca 1000 FTE, , Je stuurt onder meer op de volgende aspecten efficiency en kwaliteit, Ook de tevredenheid van je medewerkers is n van de speerpunten in ons internationale HRbeleid Als Site Operations Manager weet je wat er speelt bij je mensen en wat hen motiveert en inspireert Het is het grootste goed in je organisatie om zowel de efficiency als de kwaliteit te behalen, maar ook de mooie internationale cultuur bij Ingram Micro te versterken, , Naast de dagelijkse aansturing wordt er van je verwacht dat je initiatief toont en komt met voorstellen ter verbetering van de operatie Tevens zul je intensief samenwerken met de klant en zal een groot deel van je werk bestaan uit projecten waarin je zowel deelnemer als manager zult zijn Continuous Improvement LEAN ligt verankerd in de operatie en zowel adhoc als in projectvorm ben je samen met het team verantwoordelijk voor de succesvolle implementatie van jullie verbeteringen, , Je werkt nauw samen met je collegas uit de Controlroom, andere MTleden waaronder MTleden van bolcom, Business Analisten en Engineers Je rapporteert in deze rol aan de Director Fulfilment Operations vanuit je standplaats, het Bolcom Fulfilment Center, in Waalwijk, , , Ingram Micro CLS is de efulfilment partner van grote etailers waaronder bolcom en de Bijenkorf Al jaren groeien wij en onze klanten sterk Dit verwachten wij ook in de komende jaren door het veranderende aankoopgedrag van consumenten en uiteraard de prestaties van onze klanten Wij innoveren hierdoor continu en investeren in mensen, machines, gebouwen en software Ingram Micro is een Amerikaanse onderneming met 154 distributie centra in 45 landen Bekijk een video van onze organisatie, , , , , , , Een leidinggevende positie met veel verantwoordelijkheid waarin van je verwacht wordt dat je, samen met de volledige operatie, elke dag de klantverwachting overtreft, , , , , Werken bij de beste eFulfilment en Warehousing partner n samen met de grootste eCommerce winkel van Nederland De functie, , Vanuit ons warehouse in Tilburg wordt zeven dagen per week de Bijenkorf bediend In de rol van Operations Manager ga je een van de hoofdprocessen van de logistieke operatie succesvol leiden Bijvoorbeeld het proces Inbound, PickingPutaway, Shop VasRetourenOverige processen of Outbound Samen met een aantal Teamleaders en Team Cordinatoren ben je verantwoordelijk voor ongeveer 100 medewerkers Je enthousiasmeert en motiveert je team om doelen te realiseren en werkt constructief aan de ontwikkeling van je mensen Je bent op de hoogte van wat er speelt binnen en buiten jouw team Een Team Cordinator is specialist in zijn of haar werkgebied en de Teamleader is de coach in het veld Jij faciliteert jouw mensen in hun behoefte en bent de connectie tussen de operatie en de directie Een people manager die organisatiesensitief is, , Naast het ontwikkelen van jouw team ben je continue bezig met een doelmatige en kostenefficinte operatie Je bent met je team verantwoordelijk voor de dagelijkse aansturing van de operationele processen en het behalen van de KPIs Je werkt zeer intensief samen met onze partner de Bijenkorf op het gebied van innovatie en ontwikkeling en informeert hen proactief De logistieke operatie werkt dagelijks in 2 shifts tussen 0700 uur en  0000 uur Jij zult veelal in de dagdienst aanwezig zijn, maar bent flexibel in de avond en weekenddiensten Jij bent er op de momenten dat het team of de werkzaamheden dit nodig hebben Naast jou zijn er nog drie andere Operations Managers, waarmee je dagelijks samenwerkt Je rapporteert aan de Manager Operations en werkt vanuit onze high tech DC in Tilburg, , , , , , , H, , In het spiksplinternieuwe omnichannel warehouse van 33000m2 worden zowel zendingen naar online consumenten in Europa als naar de zeven winkels van de Bijenkorf gestuurd Dit zijn nu zon 17 miljoen items per jaar Het omnichannel DC kenmerkt zich door een hoge mechanisatiegraad in combinatie met een breed scala aan verschillende processen, een grote variatie in volumes en daarmee mensen en artikelen Flexibiliteit, kwaliteit, efficintie en mensgerichtheid zijn in deze highend logistieke omgeving sleutelbegrippen, , , , Ingram Description, , The Canadian Red Cross Society CRCS is seeking to build its roster of Operations Managers Reporting to the International Federation Red Cross Red Crescent IFRC regional Disaster Management DM unit or an IFRC Operations Coordinator, the Operations Manager will oversee the coordination of timely, efficient and effective IFRC support to a host National Societies NS in responding to sudden and slow onset disasters and crises events, , Delegates seconded to the IFRC will provide leadership for management of IFRC disaster and crises assistance in support of a local National Society in an affected country Shehe supports the National Society in successful planning and implementation of appropriate response To achieve this aim, the Operations Manager works collectively and closely with the Disaster Management and technical units, regional and country offices of the IFRC, and focal points from the local National Society The Operations Manager is often the only delegate deployed to directly support the national society in the management of relief operations and must therefore be able to work independently and with minimal supervision Typical deployments are 312 months in duration, with the possibility of extension, , While delegates are recruited to deploy internationally with the IFRC, the CRC also uses its register of Operations Managers for domestic disaster management opportunities Within domestic operations, Operations Managers could be inserted into senior level positions resulting in the need to be able to rapidly understand and navigate new and complex operations We ask all candidates who are engaged in this register to be available for domestic operations or other relevant assignments, , , , CRC is committed to advancing Localization globally, including supporting the leadership, decision making, and capacity strengthening of National Societies in all operations We aim to deploy the right person to the right place, as local as possible and as global as necessary, , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , Assessment, , Community engagement and accountability, , Protection, Gender and Inclusion, , , , Movement context, principles and values, , National Society Capacity Strengthening, , Coordination, , Direction Setting and Quality Programme Management, , Information Management, , Resource Management, , Safety and Security, , Transition and Recovery, , Environmental Sustainability, , Collaboration and teamwork, , Conflict Management, , Interpersonal Communication, , Cultural awareness, , Judgment and decision making, , Motivating Others, , Personal resilience, , Integrity, , , , The living conditions and security can be difficult in most countries where the CRC supports programming Working conditions can be stressful and require a high level of management All CRC delegates must be cleared by the Travel Health Team with full medical and vaccination clearance, , The Canadian Red Cross is committed to gender equality and social inclusion in our workplace All qualified applications will receive consideration without regard to sex, gender identity, gender expression, sexual orientation, race, ethnic origin, color, religion, nationality, disability, age, or any other characteristic protected by applicable law We encourage all qualified persons to apply particularly Indigenous peoples, persons with disabilities, ethnic minorities, visible minorities, and others who share our values and contribute to fostering an inclusive and diverse workplace, , Please notify us as soon as possible of any adaptive measures you might require at any stage of the recruitment process

Wat ga je doen, , In het schilderachtige Domburg ligt Roompot Hof Domburg een prachtig kustpark ideaal voor gezinnen Met een camping, chalets, bungalows en villas is er voor ieder een passende accommodatie te vinden voor een heerlijke vakantie Op het park zijn een subtropisch zwembad, een kuur en beautycentrum, een theater en bowlingbanen te vinden Ook zijn er verschillende horeca gelegenheden van een snackbar of bar tot een brasserie of restaurant met een groot terras Een veelzijdig park, waar het team samen werkt om het de gasten naar hun zin te maken, , Per 1 december 2020 zijn wij op zoek naar een operational manager, , Op Hof Domburg zullen in totaal twee verschillende operations managers aan de slag gaan, die zich elk zullen focussen op een andere richting Jij zal je gaan richten op Rental  Rental Related, wat inhoudt dat je verantwoordelijk bent voor de afdelingen Receptie, Cleaning en Technische Dienst Jouw toekomstige collega zal zich gaan richten op On Park Spend, waaronder de afdelingen Horeca, Zwembad, Beauty en Animatie vallen Na twee jaar wissel je van rol, waardoor het altijd uitdagend blijft en je met een frisse blik de organisatie kunt bekijken Hierna is er de mogelijkheid om door te groeien naar de rol van general manager, , In de rol van operational manager ben jij voornamelijk op de werkvloer te vinden Je zorgt samen met de managers van de afdelingen voor de dagelijkse aansturing, maar hebt ook een helicopterview waardoor je de kwaliteit kan verhogen en processen kan naleven enof verbeteren Ook het menselijke aspect is voor jou belangrijk jij weet wat de behoefte is van je collegas en coacht en stimuleert ze zodat ze de optimale gastbeleving kunnen bieden Hospitality staat bij jou hoog in het vaandel, waardoor je weet hoe je medewerkers in de juiste richting kunt sturen, , Samen met de general manager stel je per afdeling doelstellingen op en zorg je ervoor dat deze behaald worden Naast de operationele aansturing, ben je ook verantwoordelijk voor het financile plaatje Gezamenlijk heb je n doel onze gasten een onvergetelijk verblijf bieden, , Jij, , , , Wat krijg jij daarvoor terug, , , , Roompot spirit, , Roompot Vakanties is een oerHollands bedrijf nuchter n ambitieus Op onze parken heerst een collegiale, gezellige werksfeer Ons doel is om onze gasten onbezorgd te laten genieten van hun vakantie Gastvrijheid en betrokkenheid naar onze gasten n collegas staat hierbij op nummer 1 samen genieten

Description, , The Canadian Red Cross Society CRCS is seeking to build its roster of Operations Managers Reporting to the International Federation Red Cross Red Crescent IFRC regional Disaster Management DM unit or an IFRC Operations Coordinator, the Operations Manager will oversee the coordination of timely, efficient and effective IFRC support to a host National Societies NS in responding to sudden and slow onset disasters and crises events, , Delegates seconded to the IFRC will provide leadership for management of IFRC disaster and crises assistance in support of a local National Society in an affected country Shehe supports the National Society in successful planning and implementation of appropriate response To achieve this aim, the Operations Manager works collectively and closely with the Disaster Management and technical units, regional and country offices of the IFRC, and focal points from the local National Society The Operations Manager is often the only delegate deployed to directly support the national society in the management of relief operations and must therefore be able to work independently and with minimal supervision Typical deployments are 312 months in duration, with the possibility of extension, , While delegates are recruited to deploy internationally with the IFRC, the CRC also uses its register of Operations Managers for domestic disaster management opportunities Within domestic operations, Operations Managers could be inserted into senior level positions resulting in the need to be able to rapidly understand and navigate new and complex operations We ask all candidates who are engaged in this register to be available for domestic operations or other relevant assignments, , , , , , CRC is committed to advancing Localization globally, including supporting the leadership, decision making, and capacity strengthening of National Societies in all operations We aim to deploy the right person to the right place, as local as possible and as global as necessary, , Education

Job Title: Plant Manager voor Weert Perfetti van Melle Benelux in Weert
Job Description: Wij zijn op zoek naar jou, , Al meer dan honderd jaar mogen wij het leukste en lekkerste snoep bedenken, maken en verkopen onder de familienaam Perfetti Van Melle Uiteraard kun je dit niet alleen, dus doen wij dit samen met 18000 collegas wereldwijd Samen zorgen we ervoor dat jij dagelijks kunt genieten van Mentos Gum, Fruittella, Klene, LookOLook, Chupa Chups, Smint en Frisk, , Voor de fabriek in Weert zijn we voor Perfetti Van Melle Benelux BV op zoek naar een , , In de fabriek in Weert worden Fruittella snoepjes geproduceerd Voortdurende automatisering en het doorvoeren van efficiency verbeteringen hebben bijgedragen aan het realiseren van een moderne productieomgeving Operators en monteurs worden voortdurend opgeleid om te kunnen voldoen aan de zich steeds ontwikkelende processen, , , De Plant Manager is verantwoordelijk voor de directe aansturing van productieafdeling, planning en inkoopafdeling, magazijn en de technische dienst en voor de jaarlijkse productiedoelstellingen en planningen De producten worden gemaakt in een omgeving met strenge hygineregels en moeten voldoen aan hoge kwaliteitseisen En uiteraard moet het eindproduct binnen de afgesproken kostprijs blijven Je draagt zorg voor het continu ontwikkelen van je directe medewerkers maar ook voor die van de ca 120 medewerkers binnen de fabriek, zodanig dat continue efficiencyverbetering gerealiseerd wordt In je rol houd je onder meer rekening met de geldende klant, hygine, milieu en arboeisen Als Plant Manager geef je direct leiding aan 3 shift managers, een technical manager en logistics manager zodat zij optimaal in staat zijn hun taken in lijn met het bedrijfsbeleid uit te voeren Je formuleert afdelingsdoelstellingen en faciliteert je directe medewerkers bij de realisatie hiervan Zelf rapporteer je aan de Manufacturing Director Benelux, , , , , , Wij zijn Smaakmakers in Snoep Je gaat aan de slag bij het derde grootste zoetwarenconcern ter wereld  en tweede in Europa Maar we willen blijven groeien en de beste worden in het maken van snoep, waarbij we alle hulp van onze collegas goed kunnen gebruiken We zien onze medewerkers als belangrijkste ingredint en hebben dan ook een enorm aanbod aan trainingen en opleidingen We willen hierbij ook graag onze familiaire sfeer behouden, want dat maakt ons uniek en heeft ons gebracht waar we nu staan Ook moeten we inspelen op de aanhoudende maatschappelijke discussie omtrent suiker en gezondheid, maar ook de omgang met themas als milieuvervuiling, verpakkingen en voedselveiligheid Uitdagingen genoeg dus, , Reageer via de Solliciteer button en stuur ons je cv en motivatiebrief uiterlijk 30 november toe Voor vragen betreffende de inhoud van Plant Manager bij Perfetti van Melle in deze rol bestaan je taken  verantwoordelijkheden oa uit, , , , , Je hebt minimaal een afgeronde HBOopleiding, bij voorkeur bedrijfskunde of informatiekunde enof minimaal 3 jaar ervaring in een betrouwbaar en kwaliteitsgericht Goede beheersing van de Nederlandse en Engelse taal in woord en geschrift is een eis Je beschikt over uitstekende sociale en communicatie vaardigheden en hebt bij voorkeur leidinggevende ervaring Je bent klantvriendelijk, pragmatisch, initiatiefrijk, analytisch Ervaring in de voedingsmiddelensector is een pre Je bent daadkrachtig en hebt een flexibele instelling Wij bieden Een leuke dynamische baan in een internationale en groeiende organisatie binnen een enthousiast team met een prettige en open werksfeer Het salaris is marktconform en afhankelijk Industry: ['Information Technology and Services', 'Computer Software', 'Logistics and Supply Chain']
Job Description: About This Position, , In this position which is new to the company you will centralize global service logistics You will provide our field service organization with the right spare parts, at a specific moment at the right location Not a small challenge Malvern Panalytical has customers in every corner of the world and uptime is critical, , You will work together with the global supply chain manager and local supply chain managers providing spare parts Your own team is to be defied by you It is foreseen that global service logistics needs a planning function How to arrange that is up to you to define Your main responsibilities include  Create a safe and organized working environment  Define, implement, and monitor relevant goals and KPIs  Keep a healthy balance between inventory and service levels towards internal customers  Organize IT systems ERP and CRM in the favor of service supply chain  Organize a controlled and safe return flow for parts and complete systems, , returns should be free from contamination  Keep the administrative burden of your internal customers to a minimum  Continuous improvement and followup on improvement plans  Signal development opportunities and tackle these adequately  Provide input on strategic plans regarding the supply chain  Deliver recurring and ad hoc reports  Manage the highest escalation level when it comes to availability of service parts  Be logistics sparring partner for field service managers and organization Requirements  A BSc or MSc in a relevant field  At least 6 years of relevant working experience, preferably in a capital goods environment  Knowledge of multiechelon service supply chains  Familiar ERP systems and a strong affinity with IT  A basic understanding of good warehouse management  A decisive, stress resilient, and pragmatic attitude  Expertise on planning and logistics  Well established communicative skills  Strong analytical skills  Fluent in English, , APPLY Now

Company Name: CLS Services Gepubliceerd ongeveer 18 uur geleden
Job Description: CLS Services is a leading professional recruitment agency, specialised in the recruitment and career coaching of people with a background in chemistry  life sciences For our client, Certis Europe , we are searching for a Quality Assurance  Compliance Manager, , , , Founded in 2001, Certis Europe was created from three businesses acquired by Mitsui  Co Ltd during the 1990s operating in the UK, France and Netherlands It has since grown to become a European crop protection specialist providing sales and marketing services to its suppliers alongside development and regulatory support, , Since March 2018, Certis has its own research location in the Netherlands Demonstration tests and customeroriented research are carried out in the Certis Innovation Center In addition, training and workshops are provided for customers and colleagues, , Headquarters is located in Utrecht, the Netherlands, , , The Quality Department is divided in Quality Control and Quality Assurance  Compliance In which QC is more focusing downstream, which means responsible for controlling the specifications, while QAC is more responsible for setting the specifications more strategic, , , , Do you want to work in crop protection Maintaining quality and set specifications, , As Quality Assurance  Compliance Manager you will establish  maintain a Quality Assurance System in which process, specification and standards are set and agreed with the suppliers and Tollers for raw materials, semifinished  finished goods made by Certis and third parties You are responsible for the set up of a new production location and scale up of new products from lab scale to the commercial volumes Finally, you ensure the legal compliance of Certis portfolio, , Certis produces some of their portfolio at Toll manufacturing sites This production takes place by employing complex processes and materials as well as more simpler just filling activities You, as Quality Assurance  Compliance Manager, will be responsible to set up all the agreements about product quality before the production starts, , Certis Portfolio consists of 3 types of goods, which are produced by the company, purchased bulk from suppliers to be filled in pack sizes or third party goods, which arrive ready to sell Some of the portfolio is used in conventional agriculture, while a significant part is used in organic agriculture This role is responsible to establish and maintain specifications  standards, where missing Ensure that for 3rd party products standard requirements are defined and agreed with the suppliers via Supplier Account Manager SAM network Setting specification will involve working together with marketing, sales and regulatory teams, , Like finished goods, Certis purchases raw materials namely Active ingredients, coformulants These materials have the legal obligation to meet under product registration eg  purity of Active ingredient There are also production requirements which needs to be in place eg free flowing powder You will ensure that these standards are defined, where missing, communicated and agreed with the supplier and kept maintained and updated at all times, , Like the Agrochemical Industry in general, Certis portfolio is heavily regulated You will ensure that Certis only produces the registered recipes at Toll manufacturing sites ensuring the internal processes work effectively and supply chain only puts the registered recipes into production Coformulants in use should be compliant too If not, you will work together with formulation development  regulatory teams to replace such coformulants in the recipes If recipes are unknown for third party bulk goods to be packed into various smaller packs by Certis you ensure that compliance confirmation is received from the supplier, , This role demands strong collaboration and co ordination with other departments of Certis, including portfolio, regulatory and commercial disciplines to exchange information of technical, commercial and legal nature, , , , As Quality Assurance  Compliance Manager you need to have, , , , , Reference A2000152, Contract Direct contract with client, Education HBOBSc, Contactperson Ren Kemps, Phone click apply

Offer, , an amazing opportunity to work in an international team, working with a streamlined process to do esubmissions, , , , , The organisation is an international pharmaceutical organisation that has been operating in at least forty countries across Europe, the Middle East and Africa They operate on a global level and most teams have a global focus They have everything in house like research, development, manufacturing, warehousing but also sales and marketing It is their hope to change tomorrows world and to improve the lives of individuals by providing innovative medicines in areas of health, where there is an urgent need for better treatments The organisation is clearly focused on bringing highquality medicines to the market to reach their goals Wouldnt it be lovely to join them in their journey At this moment they are open to meet an enthusiastic candidate for the Regulatory Operations Managers position, , , , As a Regulatory Operations Manager you have various responsibilities You will work with a lot of different departments and vendors on the processes, but it will be your key responsibility to manage all incoming data from the database entry team before doing the esubmission A quick overview of the process that you will be responsible for is organizing regulatory operations aspects of projectsproducts, including managing the planning, preparation, submission and tracking of correspondence, applications, and other structured data to regulatory agencies Therefore, you identify and ensure adherence to relevant submission standards and initiatemaintain relationships with key personnel within the global Regulatory Affairs organization to resolve procedural and operational complexities and identify process improvements Furthermore, the position also involves strategic and executionfocused interactions with multiple regional health authorities and other departments such as Pharmacovigilance, Marketing Operations, Data Science, Supply Chain, Manufacturing and other areas within Medical  Development The Senior Manager also serves on increasingly more significant project teamstask forces

Team Build  develop relationships with key customers within Upfield  3rd party customers Ensure the implementation of Upfields Europe Supply Chain Strategies Manage the best possible use of state of the art planning systems Project management for Operations and site projects About you This is a great job for you, if YOU  Have a masters degree in Management or Engineering Have at least 8 years of an impact Youll have to deliver on the commitments you make And well give you the freedom and flexibility to do your job and build your own career If you want to make an impact where it matters apply now

Job Title: Plant Manager voor Laura Metaal in Maastricht via Equipe
Job Description: Laura Metaal is sinds 1968 actief in de metaalbranche en werkt vanuit een drietal sites Op de site in Eygelshoven zijn de divisies metaalbewerking en samenstellingen Fabrications en de organisatie nog een handelsdivisie actief in de in en verkoop van staal, hieronder valt een vestiging in Beverwijk Laura Metaal heeft in totaal circa 200 medewerkers en kent een jaaromzet van om en nabij circa 115 miljoen, , , , Laura Staalcenter Maastricht LSM is een innovatief en ambitieus bedrijf dat zich kenmerkt door een doordachte internationale groeistrategie, enthousiaste medewerkers, en een hoge kwaliteitstandaard, , PLANT MANAGER, , , , De activiteiten van LSM bestaan uit de in en opslag van coils, het decoilen afrollen tot platen en het beitsen van platen Er werken een 70tal vaste medewerkers en circa 20 flexkrachten in een afwisselende 2 en 3 ploegen dienst Het jaarvolume is circa 350000 ton De organisatie onderscheidt zich doordat zij, in tegenstelling tot de meeste andere decoilers, onafhankelijk is en alleen opdrachten uitvoert ten behoeve van derden staalproducenten en handelaren Bovendien is zij in staat zowel grote volumes alsook kleinere volumes te behandelen Met haar expertise, snelheid en flexibiliteit en bijbehorende attitude is er sprake van een customer intimacybenadering van haar klanten Tevens staat Laura Staalcenter Maastricht te boek als een innovatieve organisatie die met haar opdrachtgevers meedenkt en hen adviseert, hetgeen door de brede klantenschare sterk wordt gewaardeerd, , In de rol van Plant Manager draagt u de dagelijkse verantwoordelijkheid voor de site in Maastricht Hierbij wordt u ondersteund door vakbekwame afdelingshoofden Decoilen, Beitsen, Logistiek, Technische Dienst en Bedrijfsbureau en ontvangt u support van enkele inhoudelijke stafprofessionals Hoofd Projecten  KAM en Quality Manager waarbij u rapporteert aan de Managing Director Veiligheid, kwaliteit en doorloopsnelheid vormen de belangrijkste speerpunten in deze positie hetgeen tot gevolg heeft dat u handson en kort op het productie en logistieke proces acteert Hiervoor is tevens een nauwe en evenwichtige samenwerking met de Commercieel Directeur van belang Het verder automatiseren van de processen en het vormgeven van de toekomstige groeistrategie zijn andere belangrijke aandachtspunten voor de komende jaren Verder heeft u, naast uw rol als operations verantwoordelijke voor de site in Maastricht, tevens zitting in het Management Team van LSM en de Arbo commissie, , , U heeft een technisch gerelateerde opleiding op HBOWOniveau en ruime ervaring als leidinggevende in een productieomgeving Voorts bent u toegankelijk, weet u structuur aan te brengen en schuwt u het niet handson op de werkvloer de medewerkers te coachen in de pragmatische en handson benadering Een stevige persoonlijkheid en het kunnen vervullen van een voorbeeldrol, completeren het ideaaltypische profiel op hoofdlijnen, , , U gaat een mooie uitdaging Job Title: Productiemanager voor Nyrstar in Budel via Limbourg & Partners
Job Description: Limbourg  Partners is een gespecialiseerd intermediair in executive search en interimmanagement voor topkader op de Euregionale arbeidsmarkt Limbourg  Partners werft, selecteert en plaatst zowel high potentials als topmanagers op tijdelijke alsook permanente basis bij, en voor ondernemingen en instellingen garandeert volledige discretie, een hoog inlevingsvermogen en een flexibele instelling biedt snel en alert oplossingen waarbij de eisen en wensen van de klanten organisatie en kandidaat centraal staan, , , , , , Nyrstar is een multinational en producent binnen de zink en loodmarkt en andere basis, edelmetalen als basisgrondstoffen voor verder verwerking en toepassing In totaal werken er zon 4100 mensen voor Nyrstar De productielocatie in Budel produceert Zink middels de productie stappen Roosting  Zwavelzuurfabriek, Loging  Zuivering, Elektrolyse en Smelterij Gieterij Nyrstar Budel produceert 300000 ton Zink op jaarbasis en telt 470 medewerkers, , PRODUCTIEMANAGER MV, , , , , Jij bent een ervaren leidinggevende binnen een productie omgeving in de procesindustrie Iemand die veiligheid hoog in het vaandel heeft staan en weet welke cultuur daar bij hoort Naast het opstellen van een productiestrategie maak je de vertaalslag naar de werkvloer Zo ben je in staat mensen te motiveren, coachen en ontwikkelen waardoor gestelde doelen gerealiseerd worden Je vindt het een uitdaging doelen te realiseren en steeds de grens te verleggen en geeft niet snel op, , , In je functie als Productiemanager ben je verantwoordelijk voor de gehele productie van de site Hierbij geef je leiding aan de productieafdelingen Roosting  Zwavelzuurfabriek, Loging  Zuivering, Elektrolyse, Smelterij  Gieterij en Expeditie bestaande uit 300 FTE Jouw directe ondergeschikten zijn de 4 Sectiechefs, een Site Logistics Cordinator en 2 stafmedewerkers tbc productieplanning Samen met dit team ben je verantwoordelijk voor de productiedoelstellingen voor de gehele site, Je bent zowel met strategische als tactisch, operationele zaken bezig De productiemanager rapporteert aan de General Manager en verder ben je lid van het MT, , , De productie van zink is een complex proces wat zich kenmerkt door procestechnische uitdagingen Hierdoor is geen dag hetzelfde en word je regelmatig met uitdagingen geconfronteerd die vragen om jouw aandacht Ondanks de ad hoc uitdagingen, ben jij in staat het overzicht te houden, prioriteiten te stellen en onder druk beslissingen te kunnen nemen zonder de doelen uit het oog te verliezen Naast, deze tactisch, operationele rol ligt de uitdaging om de lange termijnstrategie te vertalen naar concrete productiedoelstellingen Zoals keuzes in productie technische verbeteringen, continuous improvement methodieken maar ook het begeleiden van de hiermee gepaard gaande cultuurverandering in manier, van werken en acteren, , , , , , Limbourg  Partners verzorgt voor Nyrstar de Werving  Selectie van deze procedure Voor meer informatie over de positie en de procedure kun je contact opnemen met Harry Kikken, Managing Director click apply Wil je direct reageren dan zien we jouw CV met een korte motivatie graag tegemoet, Heeft u belangstelling vul uw gegevens in via onze website Wie zich reeds in ons bestand bevindt, wordt automatisch in de voorselectie betrokken

AnnePauline Wessels, , Corporate Recruiter, , Questions, , Are you interested in this vacancy Please contact AnnePauline to find out more, , , , Best Nederland, , , Heliox is the Global Market Leader in charging infrastructure for electric buses At this time our reliable and robust products are being used in the worlds largest ebus projects We also deploy fast charging infrastructure for electric trucks and marine transport as a turnkey solution, , , , As an experienced operational project buyer, you have a pivotal role within Heliox Emobility is an exciting, fast growing new market our chargers keep electric buses and trucks moving Taking on this role will mean for you that you can make an immediate contribution to a more sustainable future, with cleaner air in urban life and lower global emissions as a result, , Want to see what our mission is about Check out this 1 minute film, , , , As operational project buyer you will be responsible within Heliox regarding operational purchase and logistic activities in a certain geographical region, you are responsible for creating and releasing purchase orders in line with the requirements from sales and follow up with the suppliers, ensuring ontime in full delivery You have regular contact with your internal stakeholders, including project members and procurement colleagues and externally with your suppliers, , During your daily work, you are the key operational communication channel between the projects, procurement and the suppliers and responsible for accurate processing of purchase orders and up to date information related to all outstanding purchase orders, , Besides tender processes in which you participate to build an attractive proposal, you will be taking care of the whole manufacturing and purchasing journey when the customer awards us with their order, , The Operational Project Buyer works collaboratively in project teams and is supportive to make sure everyone on the team is motivated and able to deliver a good quality project on time within budget, , You will strive to innovate the purchasing process and practices associated with continuously improving it, , A selection of your task, , , , , , , , , , , , Good at self learning  you are always gathering knowledge about the purchasing process You have demonstrated ability to coordinate crossfunctional work teams toward task completion You excel in proactively planning and organizing your workload, and you combine your communication skills with effective teamwork You strive for excellence in all you say and do, , , , , , that our selection processes can continue and we look forward to your application with enthusiasm, , , , Heliox is a company that is growing rapidly 3 years ago, we were with 30 people, now we are with over 100 Helioxers and in 2020 we expect to grow even more Our fast charge systems have been installed in more than 20, , countries all over the world Over the last couple of years, we have won that, , We achieve short process times through our short communication lines and processes This enables us to deliver custom made products in a short time window We barely know any hierarchy everyone ANDRITZ FEED  BIOFUEL BV, , ANDRITZ Feed and Biofuel, , ANDRITZ Feed and Biofuel is one of the worlds leading suppliers of technology and services for the animal feed, aqua feed, pet food, and biofuel industries, and is part of ANDRITZ GROUP, , We offer an extensive line of equipment for the production of highquality feed and biomass products We pair our equipment with our state of the art automation solutions to ensure full process traceability, , We have decades of experience designing and building feed and biomass plants including engineering, installation, startup, and commissioning, as well as aftermarket parts and service This experience has resulted in hundreds of successful feed and biomass plants all over the world, , However, ANDRITZ is just not passionate about our machines  We are passionate about people, and we have the best in the industry When you choose ANDRITZ Feed and Biofuel as your partner, you get a dedicated team of professionals, who are there with you, every step of the way, , , , , , We are currently seeking an experienced Supervisor for Maintenance to join our Manufacturing Team in BU Aftermarket This position is located in Geldrop, The Netherlands and reports directly to the Production Manager, , , , Detailed job description, , In this position, you will be responsible for the maintenance of the machines and tools at all production departments and our own workshop and you will also be managing four members of staff, apprentices and trainees You prepare an efficient time schedule for repairs and maintenance and you are responsible for a good utilisation rate of engineers You proactively come up with ideas and you make suggestions to improve processes in the field of efficiency, etc You are responsible for enforcing a safe working environment and you make requests for orders of small equipment, tools, provisions for the workshop and equipment for scheduled maintenance In order to safeguard the quality of the work and processes, you are responsible for the correct work instructions and drawings, etc You are included on the emergency repair service rota You work on the basis of the ANDRITZ core values passion, collaboration, versatility and future prospectives, , Candidates profile, , , , Personal Characteristics, , Education, , Senior secondary vocational higher education or equivalent ability, , For additional information on the position, please do not hesitate to contact Lyanne Pas, HR Manager via email humanresourcesandritzcom, , If you would like to make a difference together with ANDRITZ Feed and Biofuel, please send you resume and CV before  Please indicate Supervisor Maintenance, , To learn more about ANDRITZ Feed and Biofuel go to andritzcomft, , We are looking forward to hearing from you

Job Title: Manager of Data Engineering - Enterprise Data Management
Job Description: Since Bookingcom started facilitating bookings in 1996, the amount of data produced and consumed has increased in unimaginable proportions 20TBday, certainly from the perspective of our founders The last decade, open source data tools Hive, Spark, Cassandra and Kafka running on large internal server parks enabled hundreds of colleagues working closely with data to produce various data products, eg in Machine Learning and Analytics As the community has grown, so have the number of challenges around working with data Providing flexible compute resources introduced the onset of clouds in parallel to a heavily utilized onpremise environment Governments introduce standards for personal data protection A growing and physically more disconnected employeebase is less able to share tribal knowledge regarding data finesses Hence the establishment of Enterprise Data Management, a group governing the production and consumption of data, so it can be trusted and understood, , You would work as a Manager of Data Engineering for EDM You are a technical subject matter expert and organisational leader who drives data engineering strategies and delivery for a team, through handson execution and people management Working closely with other technology and product leads, you will drive the data engineering development plan for your team and lead the capacity planning for its execution You will guide the daytoday activities of your team members, providing technical direction and actively contributing to the work You lead identification of data engineering skill gaps within your team and drive development of tools, materials, and training to bridge these gaps, , Bresponsible, , , , You are a role model of the Bookingcom values, , , , Bskilled, , , , Boffered, , , , Bookingcom is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, colour, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status We strive to move well beyond traditional equal opportunity and work to create an environment that allows everyone to thrive

Introduction, , A very interesting position for an engineer who feels challenged in improving the production process to ensure product quality, short leadtimes, high efficiency and short time to market for Production, , Function, , To design, maintain, and optimize production processes and adapt to changed output requirements Develop and apply methods of measuring the performance of the production process Support the Production in order to ensure product quality, short leadtimes and short time to market, , The sector Operations is responsible for the production of wafer scanners The complete production process of the most advanced machines takes place within Manufacturing, , The EUV Factory EF produces the newest generation wafer scanners Within this Factory, Production Engineering EF PS PE continuously adapts, optimizes and supports the production processes of production including the system installation and qualification process at the customer location, , As EF Production Engineer you will contribute to the 4 main PE drivers, , , , Although working from a competence group, flexibility is expected, to secure the EF output plans and cycle time roadmaps, , Continuous Improvement, , , , Support, , , , Offer, , Orion Engineering tops the list of its customers when it comes to finding the best candidates For you, this means that there are various options to get started and work on the latest developments in your field There is always a Business Manager to provide you with individual guidance, which allows you to develop yourself optimally and take your knowledge to the next level Orion Engineering is th director in shaping your career in technology optimally

Job Title: Manager Clinical Supplies / Clinical Trial Supplies Coordinator in Utrecht Fulltime
Job Description: Introductie, For our global RD client in the Utrecht region Herakles Pharma Staffing is looking for a Manager Clinical Supplies  Clinical Trial Supplies Coordinator, , Het bedrijf  The company, Our client is a global RD organisation with its global mission to deliver health through food to as many people as possible Their research and innovation areas have evolved, but they still begin with insights into nutrients and their role in optimal health, and build on that knowledge to tailor solutions for nutritional needs throughout the lifespan of their target populations, , De functie  The role, A summary of the responsibilities, , Coordinate clinical study product production and storage, Arrange study product blinding, provision of code envelopes and unblinding Job Description: Key Supplier Manager, Date06 October 2020, Place of work Netherlands, Send your application, , , , Our Procurement Department is aimed at enhancing the quality of the Stamicarbon business through innovative growth of the portfolio, building upon our leading position in providing high quality products and services, and continued implementation of operational excellence, , In order to catch up with the expanding business and further strengthen the Department we are recruiting for a, , Key Supplier Manager, , Stamicarbons procurement department is currently expanding its scope to postorder management A key part of new accountabilities will be making sure that the selected suppliers represent the lowest Total Cost of Ownership for Stamicarbon, for which it is essential that Supplies are delivered in quality and that delivery dates are met, , As a Key Supplier Manager, you are a senior professional of Stamicarbon which is responsible to ensure the ontime delivery of critical equipment supplies, by following the expediting methodology in Stamicarbon and the policies and best practices from the Maire Tecnimont Group, , You act as the extended arm of Stamicarbon to manage on 360 degrees the execution of projects at suppliers, , You report hierarchically to the Head of Procurement Department, and on a project basis to assigned project managers You deal in authonomy with all suppliers execution related activities and keep the Project Manager informed to allow himher to manage the clients requirements and expectations, , You are supervised by a senior colleague within the department and follow the established procedures, instructions and standards

Description, , Do you want to work for a fast growing, sparkling company Keep on reading, , Sodastream is looking for an ambitious and resultoriented Team lead assembly for the assembly department We are looking for people who can move mountains We are looking for excellent and ambitious people who fits to our own special DNA People who enjoy doing business and who can leave a mark of excellence on their role and take an active part in the revolution to a better world, , , , The positions of team lead is mainly aimed for managing and mentoring the assembly team to ensure daily shift targets are achieved, specifications are met and ontime supply is realized in line with the KPI targets The positions are fulfilled in 2 shifts, , , , , , , , , , , Sodastream is a growing company and there are plenty of opportunities to grow with us We offer you a fun, versatile and vibrant work environment in which you can adequately challenge and develop yourself In addition, you will work in a fresh and open team, with lots of freedom and responsibilities in your work, , Interested and want to know more about Sodastream Take a look at our website

Introductie, Janssen Biologics BV is one of the Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies of Johnson  Johnson, and is focused on the development, production and marketing of vaccines and antibodies to prevent and combat infectious diseases At the Leiden Site, talented and multiscaled people are working in a dynamic culture in which innovation and a can do state of mind are the central points, , De functie  The role, Would you like to be directly involved in the fight against the global, Corona virus COVID19 pandemic Then keep reading, , , , The Vaccine Launch Facility VLF is a stateoftheart vaccines GMP manufacturing facility located at the Bioscience park in Leiden, where we produce vaccines against infectious diseases, such as HIV RSV The VLF is designed to manufacture drug substance on a 1000 L scale for Phase III and commercial purposes  As a response to the global COVID19 pandamic the VLF has been appointed as one of the production sites for Janssens lead vaccine candidate for COVID19, , , , The operations department plays a central role within the VLF and is responsible for on time manufacturing and delivery of the planned batches against the highquality standards and safety and compliance regulations that are applicable for vaccine manufacturing, , The operations department holds around 80 people and is divided in 4 teams 3 Teams are responsible for the actual on time production and delivery of the batches USP, DSP and Operations Support and one Team COE is responsible to support the production teams with specialized and indepth knowledge and skills on our production processes, , , , As manufacturing supervisor operations, you will lead a group of manufacturing operators and senior manufacturing operators within the VLF operations department You work closely with the other manufacturing supervisors, manufacturing specialists, process engineers and operation manager, , As supervisor, you will further build on and maintain the completely new organization for de VLF This means you will lead the recruiting process for operations department of the launch facility, manage and coach the operations team during the phase III and commercial production of vaccines In this role you will have a lot of interaction with different departments within Janssen Biologics and Janssen Vaccines to ensure there is a good connection and that the VLF is embedded into the Janssen organization, , As supervisor you are part of the management team of the VLF and reports to the operation manager, , The manufacturing supervisor gets the best out of his or her people and is responsible for delivering a highquality product within the applicable standards in the field of safety and compliance, , , , The execution of the activities within the operations support team, according to the set standards cGMP, EHSS, Process Excellence and continuously improves it, As a people manager, ensuring that there is a stable team with a positive constructive atmosphere You motivate, coach and support your employees to get the best out of your team, Performing all people management task eg holds the 5 conversations, recruitment and selection, absenteeism guidance, coaching, propagating the CREDO values, Sufficient training process, process excellence, etc and occupation of the team members, Supporting and leading to reaching the Operations Vaccines Launch Facility objectives, Setting priorities and aligning them with the departments involved, constantly assessing and improving the efficiency of the processes and the team, so that the production systems, the production facility and the resources are optimally utilized, An effective communication between the various locations, customers internal  external JVP  JBV and promotes cooperation and synergy in this, , Supervising activities carried out by third parties maintenance, repairs, qualifications, etc in your responsible area, , Het profiel  Your profile, , , , Bachelors degree in biotechnology, biochemistry, biomedicine, process technology or equivalent education, 68 years experience in a biotechnology or biopharmaceutical industry environment, Demonstrable organizational and managerial capacities, Demonstrable people management qualities, Excellent communication skills, Good command of English and Dutch in word and writing, Demonstrated EHS and GMP awareness, Experience with Lean methodology, Certified Green Belt, , , , Enthusiastic Team player, flexible, Can do attitude, critical and proactive, People management skills supportive leadership, change management skills, motivating and coaching, developing the individual and the team to a higher level, Strategic thinking setting frameworks and goals and translating the departmental vision from the Business Cascade, Innovative Continuous innovation of the work processes and working environment, Analytical ability and dealing with complexity Interpret facts, makes connections between multiple signals, searches for the root cause Identifies obstacles for the medium term, Diversity  Inclusion Making optimal use of different talents, knowledge and skills, Stress resistant Remains calm and exudes calm to the environment, even in complex situations, Strategic thinking setting frameworks and goals and translating the departmental vision from the Business Cascade, Credo Applies an example function in your own behavior and stimulates this behavior and attitude, Collaboration and communication Build solid, productive relationships inside and outside the department, Decision making Can make timely decisions within set frameworks, Dutch speaking, reading and writing skills, English speaking, reading and writing skills, Able to work in a shift regime shift working ours will be between 7002400 and sometimes in weekends

Ben je een ervaren Logistiek Manager met een sterk probleemoplossend vermogen Ken je de transport wereld van binnen en van buiten Dan is deze functie iets voor jou, , Dit ga je doen, , Als Non Terminal Based Operations Manager rapporteer je direct aan de Terminal Manager bij DHL Freight in Eindhoven Je maakt deel uit van het lokale MT en geeft direct leiding aan twee supervisors van de afdeling NTBO Planning en indirect aan ongeveer 15 planners Jij bent het aanspreekpunt in de terminal als het gaat om NTBO vraagstukken en je begeleidt, instrueert, coacht en motiveert de supervisors en andere collegas waar nodig, , Om te zorgen voor een optimale klanttevredenheid sta je in nauw contact met de klanten en met je collegas van Sales, Customer Services en met de Transport Procurement Manager Met hen bespreek je onder andere de SLAs, raamovereenkomsten met vervoerders, prijskwaliteit verhoudingen en KPIs Daarnaast ben je verantwoordelijk voor het bewaken van het beleid en het realiseren van de financile en kwaliteits doelstellingen zoals vastgelegd in het jaarplan, , Door jouw enthousiasme, overtuigingskracht en nadrukkelijke sturing op kwaliteit en efficiency ben je in staat om processen te vereenvoudigen en met je team het gewenste resultaat te behalen, , , , , , , , DHL is wereldwijd marktleider op het gebied van internationale expresdiensten en logistieke diensten DHL biedt deskundigheid op het gebied van expres, lucht en zeevracht, landtransport, contract logistieke oplossingen en internationale postdiensten DHL Freight, gevestigd in Eindhoven, is verantwoordelijk voor internationale transportoplossingen palletvervoer in Europa, , , , , , , , , , , , Ben je genteresseerd in deze functie Dan kom ik graag met je in contact Solliciteer voor 9 december 2020 via of bel mij voor meer informatie Judith Beuse, Recruiter ai, click apply

Job Description: Purpose of the job, , As the Senior Account Manager, you will be responsible for 1 of our key clients operating in the electronics industry, HQ located in the Netherlands You will work closely alongside the Account Manager to ensure solutions are developed and delivered on time and against operational and financial business targets You will be part of a broader team, developing and maintaining a strong relationship with key client stakeholders at all levels The position contains onsite activities in the Amsterdam region, home office activities and close contact with our office in Rotterdam, , We expect you to be a strong leader who can focus on the vision and strategies of the account while managing the tactical components of running the daily business Balance daily support needs with longterm strategy and successfully combine vision and reality into effective plans Growing the business by extending our reach over categories and departments, , The perfect candidate will have either senior agency or production management experience with a proven track record for delivering client solutions and nurturing relationships A deep understanding of Marketing activities in the electronics market is a plus, , , , You will be responsible for maintaining an excellent standard of communication with existing clients and developing relationships and ways of working with new clients You will be coordinating and liaising with the global team, the Account Director and operations team to deliver your objectives, , You will be a confident self starter with excellent communication, relationship building and organisational skills This role combines pitching and strategic planning as well as driving excellent project delivery for existing clients Strong Client facing and presentation skills are essential as is a strategic brain and the ability to question the norm and look outside the box

Job Title: ICT Project Manager – FAB MES & Automation
Job Description: ICT Project Manager  FAB MES  Automation, , Context, , Currently, imec is replacing its legacy MES by a multiyear program called oneFab During this migration, the legacy MES and the new oneFab MES are running in parallel For the implementation, imec is working together with a Portuguese partner, An important trajectory is the automation of tools Production equipment in the Fab are interfaced to the MES both to the legacy MES and to oneFab, The automation trajectory is one of the main projects you will lead, as well as the MES legacy upgrade and oneFab related side projects, , What you will do, , The ICT Project Manager FAB MES  Automation is endtoend responsible for the successful realization of the projects assigned to himher in line with the project objectives, scope, budget  timeline as defined in the project charter, To ensure successful delivery of the project, the ICT Project Manager coordinates and monitors all aspects of the project, including stakeholder and change management, in line with the project methodology and deliverables as defined by imec, , , , , , , , What we do for you, , We offer you a challenging role in which you think and act strategically and in which you have a concrete impact on large programs within imec This is your opportunity to work in an advanced hightech environment, contributing to technologies that will have an impact on tomorrows society At imec, we offer ongoing learning opportunities to help you acquire new skills or deepen existing expertise, Your valuable contribution and that of your colleagues make imec a top player in its field Your energy and commitment are therefore appreciated by means of an attractive and competitive salary with many fringe benefits, , Who you are

What do we offerFresenius Medical Care offers new colleagues a permanent contract with a competitive salary, bonus and leasecar Besides that we are offering a flexible working environment including working from home Within Fresenius Medical Care there is an informal working atmosphere, in which attention is paid to each individualWho are weFresenius Medical Care is the worlds leading provider of products and services for people with chronic kidney failure Around 35 million patients worldwide with this disease regularly undergo dialysis treatment Dialysis is a lifesaving blood cleansing procedure that substitutes the function of the kidney in case of kidney failure We care for more than 348,000 patients in our global network of more than 4,000 dialysis clinics At the same time, we operate 45 production sites in more than 20 countries, to provide dialysis products such as dialysis machines, dialyzers and related disposables We aim to continuously improve our patients quality of life by offering them highquality products as well as innovative technologies and treatment concepts Would you also like to make your contribution to kidney patientsJoin Fresenius

Air Liquide is the global leading supplier of industrial and medical gases In the Benelux, Air Liquide operates an extensive pipeline grid and several onsite production units to deliver industrial gases oxygen, nitrogen, hydrogen and carbon monoxide Air Liquide also operates cogeneration plants, coproducing steam and electricity The mission of Energy Management is to actively manage energy in our business model and operations, and provide guidance on topics related to climate and energy transition To reach this, the department is looking for an enthusiastic Energy  Climate Project Manager, with a passion for energy strategies, , WHAT DOES AN ENERGY  CLIMATE PROJECT MANAGER DO, , As Energy  Climate Project Manager within the Energy team ALBI you will need to understand the Energy Market and the influence of energy in the Air Liquide business Your mission is to create value and to develop projects related to climate and energy transition Your focus will be on the Netherlands Location This position is located in Rotterdam, with occasional travel to other AL offices in BENL, , MISSION AND MAIN ACTIONS, , Your mission as Energy  Climate Project Manager will be to support Air Liquide to reach its climate objectives and to ensure its interests are represented in the different advocacy organisations, , , , The ideal candidate has a Master Degree in Business or Engineering with some additional business orientation The candidate Energy  Climate Project Manager has a good knowledge of Dutch Energy regulation, and experience in Public Affairs She has a clear and concise communication style, and goes beyond the mainstream commercial approach Curiosity and eagerness to understand complex matters is a real plus, , EXPECTED COMPETENCIES, , , , Supported by our talented Benelux team, youll grow in an international company and develop a large spectrum of skills teamwork in an international environment, Project management, Autonomy, Energy market Expertise, Analytical view, SelfConfidence, AL Industrial process Knowledge, Presentation Skills  much more, , Briefly We are looking for an energetic and assertive person, motivated to apply for a job with broad international career perspectives, , This project is the perfect job opportunity to step into the AL world and more specifically the energy part of it You will get a lot of exposure and will be able to build a large network within the company, which can serve, if satisfying results, as a step up towards next challenges within the company, , Ready for your next challenge Apply today

Description, , Do you want to work for a fast growing, sparkling company Keep on reading, , Sodastream International BV is looking for a fun loving, strategic thinker with keen business insights, exceptional accountant skills, who is commercially aware and has proven experience in a major corporate environment in a senior finance role We are looking for a Finance Manager for our production location in The Netherlands NLC, who will be operating at a strategic level and closely collaborate across departments, , The Finance Manager NLC will be a key player in business development within an exceptional growth environment Directly reporting to the European CFO and acting as a key member of our local management team, , , , , , , , , , , At SodaStream, we are on a mission with a purpose saving the environment by reducing singleuse plastic waste Every SodaStream bottle replaces thousands of singleuse plastic bottles, , SodaStream enables consumers to easily transform ordinary tap water into sparkling water and flavoured sparkling water in seconds By making ordinary water fun and exciting to drink, SodaStream helps consumers drink more water SodaStream offers a highly differentiated and innovative solution to consumers of bottled and canned carbonated soft drinks, , , , SodaStream is a growing company and there are plenty of opportunities to grow with us We offer you a fun, versatile and vibrant work environment in which you can adequately challenge and develop yourself In addition, you will work in a fresh and open team, with lots of freedom and responsibilities in your work, , Are you interested and do you want to know more about SodaStream Take a look at our website

Consultant Videographer, , Position limited to individuals of the Syrian diaspora, WOMEN, PEACE AND SECURITY PROGRAMME, , Application deadline 22 November 2020, , , , Hivos seeks new and creative solutions to persistent global problems solutions created by people taking their lives into their own hands We offer a positive counterbalancing force against discrimination, inequality, abuse of power and the unsustainable use of our planets resources Our mission is to innovate for social change With smart projects in the right places, we work towards more open and green societies, , Background on Women, Peace and Security Syria, , Funded by the Dutch Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Women, Peace and Security Syria project was codesigned by Hivos and three Syrian organisations, who have an office in neighbouring countries but operate both inside and outside of the country Implementation is also the coresponsibility of Hivos and its three partners The project aims at creating a peaceful solution to the current conflict through active involvement of women of all sectors, geographical zones and political affiliations The project promotes upward participation and downward accountability To achieve this overall goal many activities are organised at community level, governorate and national level This implies, dialogue sessions, conferences, workshops, advocacy, training sessions and gender awareness raising activities, , , , Hivos is requesting proposals from videographers to produce a short advocacy film in support of the project activities The video shall be produced before 15 December Production will be carried out virtually with no travel involved, , Key Deliverables and Expectations, , Submission of a clear work plan, including a timeline of the video production, , Coordination with stakeholders identified by Hivos, with support from Hivos Project Manager, , Compiling and using existing material relevant to the video message, , Filming interviews relevant to the video message and content, , Creatively producing the short video remotely, outsourcing to local videographers may be considered, , Ensure high broadcast quality of videography, , Ensure that all requests and instructions from Hivos pertaining to videography requirements and formats are fulfilled, , Work with the highest professional ethical standards and in keeping with Hivos core values, , , , 5 years of working experience in video production, , 2 years experience filming professionally, , Professional certificate from a film school is an asset, , Proven experience in producing videos for advocacy efforts, , Have final Cut Pro editing skills or other professional editing software, , Have knowledge of different video formats and video file conversions, , Have online video publishing skills, , Fluent in English and Arabic, , Familiarity with the Syrian context, , Commitment to womens empowerment and the goals of Women, Peace and Security, , Submission Requirements, , A cover letter outlining motivation, , , CV of consultant, , Contact information, , Provision of at least two video samples of video work via URL

Job Description: The new phase of EU Confidence Building Measures Programme, funded by the European Union and implemented by UNDP has the overall objective to contribute to the facilitation of the settlement of the Transnistrian conflict by supporting the increase of confidence between Chisinau and Tiraspol through joint initiatives involving local authorities, civil society organizations and other stakeholders from both sides of the river, , Specific objectives, , , Under the guidance and direct supervision of the Programme Manager, the incumbent contributes to an effective and efficient implementation of confidence building projects through a range of actions contributing to the design, planning, management and monitoring of project activities The AdministrativeFinance Associate applies and promotes the principles of resultsbased management RBM, as well as a clientoriented approach consistent with UNDP rules and regulations, , The AdministrativeFinance Associate works in close collaboration with the Project team as well as the team in the Country Office CO for effective achievement of results, anticipating and contributing to resolving complex programmeprojectrelated issues and information delivery The incumbent is expected to exercise full compliance with UNDP programming, financial, procurement and administrative rules, regulations, policies and strategies, as well as implementation of the effective internal control systems, , , , The AdministrativeFinance Associate in close cooperation with the project team, under the direct guidance and supervision of the Programme Manager, will ensure the provision of financial and administrative services of the highest quality and standards to the project team, UNDP Country office, as well as national counterparts and clients, , Administrative management, , , Financial management, , , Procurement, , , Corporate Competencies, , , Knowledge Management and Learning, , , Development and Operational Effectiveness, , , Leadership and SelfManagement, , , Education, , , Experince, , , Language Requirements, , , This is a local position, therefore only citizens of the Republic of Moldova or others legally authorized to work in the country are eligible to apply, , Please note that only applicants who are shortlisted will be contacted, , Online applications can be submitted by registered users only Selfregistration link is available at the next page and requires candidates to provide a valid email address, , Contract Duration one year with possibility of extension
