Location Leiden, the Netherlands, , GenScript description, , GenScript Biotech CorporationStock Code 1548HK is a global biotechnology group GenScripts businesses encompass four major categories based on its leading gene synthesis technology, including operation as a Life Science CRO, enzyme and synthetic biology products, biologics development and manufacturing, as well as cell therapy GeneScript has a global market share of 30 in synthetic biology, making it the biggest company in the industry, , Founded in 2002 and listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange in 2015, GenScript has an established global presence across Greater China, North America, the EU, and the Asia Pacific Today, over 300,000 customers from over 160 countries and regions around the world have used GenScripts premier, convenient, and reliable products and services, , GenScript BV is the European headquarters of GenScript Biotech Currently, we are looking to hire a Marketing managerspecialist to be responsible for Catalogue products of molecular biology including proteins, cytokines, protein analysis tools and appliances in the European market through a number of marketing channels including but not limited to conferences, exhibitions, roadshows, seminars, webinars, social media and more The candidate should have indepth knowledge and experience about molecular biology experiments, including gene synthesis, protein expression, peptide production and so on as well as keen interest and knowledge on the marketing activities in science market The candidate should be able to foster a valuable partnership with sales and helping them hit their quotas through custom and personalized field marketing strategies and tactics The candidate should have an extensive experience in digital marketing strategies as well, , The position reports to the Manager of Logistics in GenScript BV, , , , Export  Import specialist, , The position is a fulltime job based in our European Headquarters in Leiden, the Netherlands

Industry: ['Mechanical or Industrial Engineering', 'Staffing and Recruiting', 'Oil & Energy']
Job Description: Are you interested in contributing to the development of innovative CNG, LNG and H2 fueling stations Setting standards for pressure equipment and piping as part of stateoftheart installations which will be used all over the word Then we have the perfect job for youSenior Mechanical EngineerTotal Gas Mobility TGM is navigating the Total group in its mission to become a world leader in natural, renewable and hydrogen gas mobility, and smallscale LNG by 2030 One of its fields of expertise is supplying CNG, LNG and H2 fueling stations The stations are stateof theart, with extremely high pressures up to 1000bar and highpower rotating equipment We will be setting the standard for all Total stations worldwide towards the future This means that you will have a big influence on how stations are going to look like and function Within Total Gas Mobility you will be part of the Production and Engineering department and you will be reporting to the Manager Engineering Responsibilities As a Senior Mechanical Engineer, you are ultimately responsible for the definition and selection of mechanical equipment and piping components inside the installations You will set the standard for global application within Total and its affiliates You must ensure that the installations function as intended according to the functional design plan And ensure that the design is up to date with all the safety, mechanical and functional demands Of course, you will keep a keen eye on the costs as well, in order to deliver an operational and affordable station to the client Project planning and progress reporting are part of the job As knowledge focal point you will play a key role in communication between our organization and our clients What exactly are you going to doDesign or specify the mechanical parts of the installations, in line with Total Group principles, as well as national, European and international standards, rules and regulations, with emphasis on CAPEXOPEXconstructability, maintainability and operabilityParticipate in HAZOP studies, as well as constructability, maintainability and operability reviewsReport on planning and progress of projectsDevelop mechanical standards in your field, make these available to the relevant affiliates in the group and set KPIs for performanceBuild and maintain a network of connections with affiliates in the groupThe ideal Senior Mechanical Engineer Since we will be setting the standards for the future, we are looking for an innovative and entrepreneurial person You agree with us that, apart from creativity, it is important to document our work in terms of basis, process and outcome of our designs Preferably you have experience with our type of installations Your profileMasters degree in mechanical engineering with at least 10 years of professional experience on complex process installationsKnowledge of and experience with national, European and international standards, rules and regulations as applied in the process industryKnowledge of and experience with CNG, LNG, andor H2installations is a plusKnowledge of English language, knowledge of Dutch andor French are strongly advisedEffective, coaching, cooperative, analyticProject oriented person and good communication skills both verbal and writtenWhy you should join us We are a solid company with clear growth ambitions Total Gas Mobility has a major stake in Totals NetZero2050 climate ambition The position is challenging with room for initiative and responsibility You have career opportunities to expand beyond this role Within the Total Group we strive for diversity and welcome openminded, daring and caring people in tune with the Total spirit We offer an attractive salary in line with your age and experience And last, but not least, you will have the opportunity to work with us to create a better future Total Gas Mobility Total is a major energy player that produces and markets fuels, natural gas and lowcarbon electricity Our 100,000 employees are committed to better energy that is safer, more affordable, cleaner and accessible to as many people as possible Active in more than 130 countries, our ambition is to become the responsible energy major On January 1st, 2020, PitPoints offerings merged into the Total group A global competence centre for natural gas for vehicles NGV, renewable biomethane and hydrogen gas H2 for mobility, including customised public transport solutions across all new energies, and small scale LNG for mobility  industry use, is now located at PitPoints former HQ in Nieuwegein and operating under the name Total Gas Mobility Together, we strive for sustainable mobility with low carbon fuels, and contribute to our companys NetZero2050 climate ambition Interested Are you interested Thats great If your skills and experience match this job description, please send us your CV and motivation letter via our online application page For more information you can look at or contact Corporate Recruiter Caroline Wetselaar via 6 Due to COVID19 restrictions initial interviews can be held via Microsoft TeamsAcquisition in response to this vacancy is not appreciated

ASM ALSI is a subsidiary of ASM Pacific Technology, the worlds largest assembly and packaging equipment supplier and the worlds third largest surface mount technology SMT equipment supplier ASM ALSI develops technology, processes and machines for multibeam ultraviolet UV and infrared IR laser dicing andor grooving applications In addition, ASM ALSI develops new processes and technologies for thin wafers such as Ultra Short Pulse laser and Plasma etching processes The system engineering department is responsible for development and engineering and has mechanical, electrical and mechatronics engineers They work in close cooperation with the RD, software engineering and process engineering departments As a Senior Vision Engineer, you will be responsible for the design and engineering of advanced vision and alignment systems for the LASER1205 product line and the future LASER1206 platform You will use your knowledge and expertise to lead the technical development of the system according to the product development roadmap You will work closely together with the RD and Software engineering departments in specifying system requirements, design specifications and testprocedures customers in using the functionalities You will be reporting to the System Engineering Manager, , , , You have a MSc or PhD degree in one of the following fields Mathematics, Computer Science, in the field of Computer or Machine vision is a must You have experience in developing computer algorithms and programming and, preferably, have worked with MatlabSimulink You have experience with writing system requirements and specifications, building prototypes, and conducting performance tests You have the ability to plan, schedule and coordinate engineering activities You have a resultdriven attitude and good communication skills You are willing to travel occasionally to customer sites to deliver thirdline support and get customer feedback on our vision and alignment systems, , Your responsibilities, , Owner of system level features and specifications in the field of vision and alignment Requirements engineering for systemlevel functionalities Cooperating with and aligning multidisciplinary and international organization with challenging projects in the semiconductor industry We offer excellent employee benefits We value independent thinking and individual effort, but other ASM locations in Hong Kong and Singapore or other sites in Europe, Asia and US

Over de functie, , Over de functie, , Heb jij leidinggevende ervaring in een engineering to order productieomgeving en ben je toe aan een nieuwe uitdaging Dan hebben wij een unieke kans voor jou, Wat dacht je van een complexe technische werkomgeving, waarbij 5 teamleiders en ruim 120 medewerker, in Nijmegen, samen de grootste transformators van de wereld samenstelen Als productiemanager Assemblage  Installatie krijg je veel verantwoordelijkheden, maar ook de mogelijkheid om echt het verschil te maken, door mee te denken in verbeteringen ten aanzien van processen, kwaliteit en veiligheid, , Je verantwoordelijkheden bestaan onder meer uit, , , , De productiemanager Assemblage  Installatie valt direct onder de Operations Manager en is verantwoordelijk voor de afdeling Assemblage in Nijmegen en het onsite team zie over het bedrijf, , Wat denk je Is dit de nieuwe uitdaging waar jij naar op zoek bent Maak je geen zorgen over de arbeidsvoorwaarden, want die zijn uitstekend Een bovengemiddeld salaris en rechtstreeks contract met fulltime vast werk staan hierbij aan de basis Maar je moet er wel snel bij zijn, want de deadline voor deze vacature nadert snel Solliciteren kan via de knop, maar je mag ook contact opnemen met de specialist voor deze vacature Bas van de Sandeof mail naar , , Wat we bieden, , , , Om in transformator termen te blijven With great power, comes great responsibilities Maar daar staat natuurlijk ook een uitstekend arbeidsvoorwaardenpakket tegenover, Dit is ook geen tijdelijke functie, maar structureel vast werk bij een, nog altijd, groeiende organisatie, Als persoon blijven we ons uiteraard ook ontwikkelen en de organisatie stimuleert dit ook op elk niveau Ook als productiemanager Assemblage  Installatie krijg je de ruimte om te groeien en richting te geven aan je carrire binnen onze organisatie, , Jij zorgt op de afdeling Assemblage voor een fijne werkplek, maar dat doet de organisatie uiteraard ook voor jou De fijne collegas, de uitdagingen waar je mee te maken hebt en het meebouwen aan de organisatie maken het, dat je iedere dag met plezier naar je werk gaat, , Klinkt jou dit als muziek in de oren, dan gaan we graag het gesprek met je aan Neem dan contact op met onze specialist Bas van de Sande viaof mail naar, , Functieeisen, , , , Zoals te zien is de functie van productiemanager Assemblage  Installatie een zeer uitdagende baan met veel verantwoordelijkheden Deze functie is dan ook niet voor iedereen weggelegd, maar als jij jezelf herkend in onderstaande functieeisen, dan horen we graag van je

Shift Manager Production GMP, , Location Leiden, , This position is at a stateoftheart vaccines GMP manufacturing facility located in Leiden, where our clients produces vaccines against infectious diseases, such as HIV RSV It is designed to manufacture drug substance on a 1000 L scale for Phase III and commercial purposes As a response to the global COVID19 pandemic it has been appointed as one of the production sites for lead vaccine for COVID19, , , , As manufacturing supervisor operations, you will lead a group of manufacturing operators and senior manufacturing operators within the VLF operations department You work closely with the other manufacturing supervisors, manufacturing specialists, process engineers and operation manager, As supervisor, you will further build on and maintain the completely new organization for de VLF This means you will lead the recruiting process for operations department of the launch facility, manage and coach the operations team during the phase III and commercial production of vaccines As supervisor you are part of the management team of the VLF and reports to the operation manager The manufacturing supervisor gets the best out of his or her people and is responsible for delivering a highquality product within the applicable standards in the field of safety and compliance

Job Description: About Us, , Damen Schelde Naval Shipbuilding DSNS, established in Vlissingen has a rich tradition of naval shipbuilding with its original navy roots stemming back more than 145 years At that time the Royal Schelde shipyard, based in Vlissingen in the Netherlands, was known worldwide for its quality shipbuilding, both in the naval and commercial sector, , Over the decades the emphasis on quality continued and in 2001 Damen Shipyards Group acquired Royal Schelde along with all of its subsidiaries Following the acquisition, Damen then introduced its unique, standardized modular construction concept in Vlissingen too, allowing us to offer very fast delivery times, , We have delivered more than 400 vessels since 1875 to satisfied customers all over the world and have earned a reputation for excellence along the way We have achieved this status by producing vessels that have a lifespan that far exceeds the average by offering cuttingedge technology and the most costefficient design solutions, , The Naval  Structural group is part of the department Engineering The employees work on project base divided over the various projects, in which they contribute to both basic and detailed engineering within their field of expertise, , Responsible for the Structures part of engineering within our projects Can be involved in the preBasic Engineering phase in the project to setup a solid work break down and planning structure for all tasks that belong to the Structures discipline During the basic engineering of the project, leads a team of several Structural Engineers in order to deliver the required engineering output During the detailed engineering of the project leads a multidisciplinary team, or controls part of the outsourced detailed engineering package Will be ultimately responsible for the desired quality, timely delivery and reporting to the Project Manager Engineering Coordinates these team activities with regard to quality, progress, planning and manhours, , , , We highly value our employees and support your professional and personal development Therefore we invest in all our employees by

Job Title: Lab Technician/Associate Scientist Organoid Team - Leiden
Job Description: The Position, , Our new colleague will join a team of scientists that works on the production and development of intestinal organoid cultures for commercial projects Your main duty is to undertake cell culture activities for customer and internal projects under the direction of project leaders, eg maintenance, expansion, cryopreservation and testing of intestinal organoids You will also contribute to general lab duties under the direction and supervision of the Lab Manager approximately one day per week, but depending on demand, , Responsibilities but not limited to, , Passaging and expansion of organoid cultures, , Maintaining stocks of cryopreserved organoids Executing experiments for commercial and internal projects under the direction of project leaders Performing laboratory tasks cell culture, seed screening plates using liquid handlers, prepare compound dilutions and dispense to assay plates, fix culture plates, capture images using automated microscopes, , Carry out tasks and quality control accurately by following standard operating procedures Able to speak and record activities in lab books in English Prepare and store samples and reagents Help to keep equipment and labs in a clean and workable condition Contribute to other routine laboratory tasks that may be required, , , , Msc biochemistry, molecular biology, biotechnology or similar 23 years of working experience in a similar position within a biopharmaceutical company Previous experience with 3D cultures is a huge plus Knowledge of MSOffice and relevant quality software, Pharmaceutical Document Management System and LIMS Experience with reading, understanding and writing SOPs Eligible to live and work in the Netherlands, , Personal  Professional Skills, , Strong verbal and written communication skills in English, command of Dutch is a plus, , Proactive attitude Thorough ability to carry out tasks with an eye for completeness Selforganised ability to focus and to plan accordingly and independently Detailoriented analytical mind set, ability to pick up on important details Problem solving ability to identify problems out of trend results, trends with equipment, or test results, discuss these with the line manager, and to find a solution Cooperative ability to work within a team and with other teams to drive projects forward according to agreed time lines Accountability Recruiters do not call us, we call you Closing date December 13th, 2020 By applying you grant OcellO permission to keep your records in our archive, after the application The Blue Tulip Awards is a yearround program with multiple events that aims to connect innovators and to drive innovation together This yearround program will ultimately culminate in the finals of the awardprogram The Blue Tulip Awards team consists of a Central Team and 8 Theme Teams divided in three waves The Central Team Interns are responsible for program management, partnerships, event management and marketing  communications The Theme Interns are responsible for defining the theme strategy and executing the theme specific tasks, such as innovation scouting and guiding the themes jury process Together you will work towards one goal the biggest innovation program of the Netherlands Within the whole Blue Tulip Awards team, you are given the freedom to pursue a variety of projects, , , , , , , , During your internship, you will gain and develop the abilities needed to fulfill the position of event manager of the Blue Tulip Awards program Being in contact with different stakeholders will be the key to influence the communication and information processes Your job responsibilities will be specifically connected to facilitation, planning, managing and executing the Blue Tulip Awards events The following position comprises such aspects as concept development and handson experience of event organization Tasks such as production preparations, programming, and leading a team will be a central facet of the internship Also, you will receive a unique opportunity for allround development as an independent professional by taking full responsibility for side events and other projects, , , , , , You will be responsible for all Innovation focused events that are organized by the Marketing  Communications NL department You will be working on the reshaped Accenture Innovation Summit event, ready for new era of hybrid impact  called Forward  You will be shaping, managing and facilitating one of the biggest innovation events in the Netherlands Focus will lie on acquiring and deepening knowledge in various aspects of event organization from production management to execution You will be collaborating with internal and external stakeholders in order to arrange an abundant variety of innovationrelated activities During this internship you will be working on allround professional development, with emphasis on both applied and hard skills responsibility, organizational management, negotiation, decisionmaking, collaboration, , , , This position will facilitate the development of practical skills, whilst stimulating your managerial mindset You will be in contact with various stakeholders to ensure information and processes alignment Within the Events Team, your job responsibilities will include planning meetings, compiling task overview, coordinating the team and keeping track of the overall structure This position will largely contribute to boosting your organizational skills and strategic thinking The central aspect of the internship will be designing, coordinating and optimizing internal processes As well, you will learn to advance your abilities to ensure the successful organization of all innovation related events, such as the Blue Tulip Awards, Forward  and other campaigns, by implementing strategic steps In the course of this internship, you will emerge into a confident individual with an ability to leverage your accomplishments, , , , The everchanging pace of market developments will only continue to accelerate in the future  and many organizations struggle to challenge new innovative competition within the market How do different innovations influence the market, what are the results and how can companies adapt themselves to remain relevant in the future, , Accenture Strategy  Consulting is the driving force in helping companies answer such questions You will advise senior management in their next steps  based on data analysis, experience, expertise and an innovative approach Together with a diverse team of experts, you will challenge current industry obstacles and find the key solution for clients in their current markets Surpassing the disruption and consolidating future success for organizations, , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , Accenture is an incredible place to work and conduct your internship  and keep learning By joining us, youll become part of a global company with a worldclass brand and reputation Besides the work we do for our clients, were really proud of our vibrant, diverse workplace culture we believe in openness and honesty, fairness and equality, common sense and realism We want to get to know the real you and help you explore and grow  whatever it is youre great at So, you will always have lots of learning opportunities formal and informal to improve your rolespecific skills and expertise, , Besides our highprofile, challenging projects and our nurturing work environment, we offer you a good internship compensation, , , , Are you ready to join Accenture for a internship where you can be yourself, do what you love and conduct a awesome intern assignment Apply now with your resume and motivation and change the world around you, , Questions Connect with our internship office via stagesaccenturecom

Air Liquide is the global leading supplier of industrial and medical gases In the Benelux, Air Liquide operates an extensive pipeline grid and several onsite production units to deliver industrial gases oxygen, nitrogen, hydrogen and carbon monoxide Air Liquide also operates cogeneration plants, coproducing steam and electricity The mission of Energy Management is to actively manage energy in our business model and operations, and provide guidance on topics related to climate and energy transition To reach this, the department is looking for an enthusiastic Energy  Climate Project Manager, with a passion for energy strategies, , WHAT DOES AN ENERGY  CLIMATE PROJECT MANAGER DO, , As Energy  Climate Project Manager within the Energy team ALBI you will need to understand the Energy Market and the influence of energy in the Air Liquide business Your mission is to create value and to develop projects related to climate and energy transition Your focus will be on the Netherlands Location This position is located in Rotterdam, with occasional travel to other AL offices in BENL, , MISSION AND MAIN ACTIONS, , Your mission as Energy  Climate Project Manager will be to support Air Liquide to reach its climate objectives and to ensure its interests are represented in the different advocacy organisations, , , , represent AL Energy within different energy workgroups Furthermore it will be key to make sure changing regulations are well understood and impact on Air Liquides operations is understood and integrated If needed, your strong presence will be required to defend our position, supporting the Public Affairs department You will also maintain a professional relationship with Energy Market participants, , , , make sure to understand the CO2 regulations, and support the different plants in the monitoring and reporting You coordinate energy studies and other authority requirements, , , , support business development projects in the context of the energy transition Carbon cares, Klimaatakkoord,  in the Netherlands, , , , you will support the business development on Long term energy strategic projects Renewables, CO2, Green,  Furthermore you will contribute for the energy part on more technical related projects, , WHAT ARE THE EDUCATION REQUIREMENTS, , The ideal candidate has a Master Degree in Business or Engineering with some additional business orientation The candidate Energy  Climate Project Manager has a good knowledge of Dutch Energy regulation, and experience in Public Affairs She has a clear and concise communication style, and goes beyond the mainstream commercial approach Curiosity and eagerness to understand complex matters is a real plus, , EXPECTED COMPETENCIES, , , , you will need to speak to people with multiple backgrounds and seniority level in and outside the organisation, , Networking  influencing skills, , , , you will need to be critical towards data and not be taking the figures and explanations for granted Figures provided will need to be correct and reliable, , , , it is crucial to feel responsible  accountable of hisher deliverables, , , , you will need to lead smallmedium projects, ensuring progress and timely delivery, within the budget, , , , you will work with multidisciplinary and international team members, , , , challenging the statusquo, , Flexibility  Agile, , , , Dutch and English is a must, knowledge of French is a plus, , WHAT SKILLS WILL I DEVELOP IN THIS JOB, , Supported by our talented Benelux team, youll grow in an international company and develop a large spectrum of skills teamwork in an international environment, Project management, Autonomy, Energy market Expertise, Analytical view, SelfConfidence, AL Industrial process Knowledge, Presentation Skills  much more Briefly We are looking for an energetic and assertive person, motivated to apply for a job with broad international career perspectives This project is the perfect job opportunity to step into the AL world and more specifically the energy part of it You will get a lot of exposure and will be able to build a large network within the company, which can serve, if satisfying results, as a step up towards next challenges within the company, , Ready for your next challenge Apply today

What do we offerFresenius Medical Care offers new colleagues a permanent contract with a competitive salary, bonus and leasecar Besides that we are offering a flexible working environment including working from home Within Fresenius Medical Care there is an informal working atmosphere, in which attention is paid to each individualWho are weFresenius Medical Care is the worlds leading provider of products and services for people with chronic kidney failure Around 35 million patients worldwide with this disease regularly undergo dialysis treatment Dialysis is a lifesaving blood cleansing procedure that substitutes the function of the kidney in case of kidney failure We care for more than 348,000 patients in our global network of more than 4,000 dialysis clinics At the same time, we operate 45 production sites in more than 20 countries, to provide dialysis products such as dialysis machines, dialyzers and related disposables We aim to continuously improve our patients quality of life by offering them highquality products as well as innovative technologies and treatment concepts Would you also like to make your contribution to kidney patientsJoin Fresenius

Job Title: Channel Live Operations Manager, Community Platform
Job Description: Location,  Danmark, Billund, Syddanmark, Job ID DK10241, Category, , , , This is your opportunity to bring your structural and creative knowledge about Digital Business into an innovative team In this temporary role you can facilitate the best Moderation model and playful Community strategy into the world of LEGO, , , , This temporary position ensures Product Health on a new digitalphysical big bet including tracking Product Reviews, Ratings, Consumer Feedback  Internal feedback In collaboration with product leads define and identify the strategic key results for the what and how on the live operation quality to measure up against the overall objectives of the digital product, , You take ownership for user generated content moderation pipeline  infrastructure, including working with internal  external teams collaborating on Moderation Ensure the app data workstream is implemented as planned and on time to meet the development phases of the experience, , And you will be responsible for supporting Digital Product Lead  rest of the Project Team on Product Lifecycle Management, including Beta, Soft Launch, Launch  PostLaunch, , , Become member of a cross organizational awesome team that also counts the leads of App production, Live Content team, Digital Product, Marketing, Operations, and Design This team is responsible for launch, growth, and optimization of an exciting new LEGO experience and product, , The role sits in our Digital Consumer Engagement area and will be part of a team that strive to build and operate digital kids experiences focused on building further engagement with the LEGO brand and offerings and growing the consumer relationships, , , As the right candidate you bring 35 years experience working in digital product development andor operations  preferably experience from the app space Hold a bachelors or masters degree in a tech or businessrelated field or equivalent working experience Have proven partner cooperation skills Effective at managing multiple production plans simultaneously while keeping all internal and external partners advised of key production landmarks, , To succeed we image the Candidate also have the following proficiencies, , , You have experience from an international environment  so of course, advanced English both written and verbally is a must since we work with colleagues and partners globally, , , Children are our role models Their curiosity, creativity and imagination inspire everything we do We strive to create a diverse, dynamic and inclusive culture of play at the LEGO Group, where everyone feels safe, valued and they belong, , The LEGO Group is proud to be an equal opportunity and an affirmative action employer We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status, , We support our employees in being there for the moments that matter in life and celebrate families of all kinds, the loved ones that make us who we are Being part of the LEGO Group also means taking part in our annual Play Day, playing a part in building a sustainable future and continuing our mission to inspire and develop the builders of tomorrow, , The LEGO Group is fully committed to Childrens Rights and Child Wellbeing across the globe Candidates offered positions with high engagement with children are required to take part in Child Safeguarding Background Screening, as a condition of the offer, , Thank you for sharing our global commitment to Childrens Rights, , Build your career brick by brick at the LEGO Group, , We get to create unforgettable play moments for kids through one of the most loved brands in the world We impact millions of kids around the world with our physical and digital products Who would not want to be part of this

One of our activities is to provide services for a national integration and information standard It ensures that different languages of systems speak one language together, , Our services consist of development and maintenance of the server, the message exchange platform, providing support to the various participating applications, hosting  management, security management and change and delivery management In addition to the production environment, various acceptance environments are used for this, , In this role support is provided to both server and the management organization and to representatives of all participating care applications In addition, you provide functional management of the production environment and the various acceptance environments You will work closely with the change manager  support engineer, , , , As a support engineer you ensure adequate handling of support requests that are made on the one hand by the organization and on the other hand by the affiliated participants of applications You receive these requests via a ticket system You take care of the further handling of these support requests by yourself, your fellow change manager  support engineer and colleagues in other departments such as Development and Hosting You ensure adequate communication about the support requests with the submitters, , You also provide functional management of the production environment and the various acceptance environments, with the aim that these can be used optimally by the various parties You ensure management of all configuration data and in collaboration with colleagues good performance, , , , For this interesting position we are looking for someone to carry out these activities on a temporary basis and to further optimize them, , The person we are looking for can be recognized in the following profile

Company Description, , ProPharma Group is an industry leading, single source provider for regulatory compliance, pharmacovigilance, and medical information services across the full development lifecycle for pharmaceutical, biotechnology, and medical device companies Operating around the world with offices in Australia, Canada, Germany, Japan, the Netherlands, Sweden, United Kingdom, and the United States, ProPharma Groups fully integrated service offerings will provide clients with a comprehensive suite of global support services that are required to be competitive in todays dynamic markets We build successful longterm relationships with clients by providing leading industry knowledge, experience, and proven processes, , , , As a Senior Consultant Computer System Validation, you will be assigned to IT compliance projects within the pharmaceutical, medical devices and life sciences industries Mainly working in laboratory, production and validation departments, so knowledge of and experience in these departments is an advantage This position will contribute to improving or establishing the clients IT compliance by providing them with the best possible assistance with their issues As a Senior Consultant Computer System Validation, you work on validation projects as project manager, high level consultancy projects in which you advice the client on the validation strategy for implementing IT solutions or interim management functions, , , , Qualified candidates must have, , Additional Information, , All candidates must be legally eligible to work in the Netherlands, , ProPharma Group does not accept unsolicited resumes from recruitersthird parties Please, no phone calls or emails to anyone regarding this posting
